job.title: Software Developer, Digital
job.description: As a company whose mission is to be the most progressive and inclusive money transfer business in the world, we deliver the highly reliable payment services to our customers. With locations in over 402k locations in 165 countries, we have adopted the true identity of what it means to be multicultural and embody the idea of being family, no matter where we are.At Ria, youâre be surrounded by colleagues, both in Buena Park, CA and across the Globe, who are dedicated to each other and empowered to be creative and nurture âout of the boxâ solutions.Ria Digital's line is involved in development and maintenance of Ria Digital web and mobile applications. They handle the maintenance of extensible microservices for all applications at Ria. This branch designs and delivers complex and highly scalable solutions with the best of resources available.WHAT YOU HAVE:Â 4-5 years of overall full stack software development experience 3+ yearsâ experience in high transaction volume environmentProven .NET experience (C#) and expert understanding of Object-Oriented Design and ProgrammingHands-on experience developing SOAP and RESTful services implementing authorization and authentication proceduresDemonstrated strong communication skills across cross-functional teams, peers and executivesExperience or exposure to architect/design enterprise wide applicationsOUR TECHNOLOGIES:HTML5, CSS, JavaScript libraries like Angular/ JQuery/ Ionic/Vue, .Net, C#, SQL Server, Web Services, SOAP and RESTful services.WHAT YOU WILL DO:Application analysis, design, development, unit testing and implementation activitiesCode across all layers including Front end, Web APIs, Integration with 3rd Parties, SQL scriptsBONUS POINTS FOR THESE:A bachelor's degree in Computer Science or closely related field from an accredited university; Masters preferred.
